name: Crab Dave: Void Gauntlet
description:
Crab Dave is a 2D top-down adventure game created by a team of 4 in the Spring of 2019.  This team used Unity's tile system to create a fully realized map with different bosses and objective to each area.  The team had some issues with the AI for the last part of their game, but it is still complete and beatable.

Team:

Ethan B: Art/Animation

Cam S: Programming

Danny C: Programming

Rohan: Design

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Space to Burrow

Shift to Attack
